name: Reversidroid
description:
Simple Reversi (Othello) game for Android.

Casual strategy game to play in your free time.

3 Skill levels. (Even on hard the game isn't too taxing)

Place your counter either side of 1 or more enemy counters in a row to take enemy counters.

You must place your counter next to an enemy counter and you must always take at least 1 enemy counter.

Game is over if you have no more counters or there is no more room left on the board.

Note: Game-play video has muted sound.
